author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1878.  Add space between priority links on job details page.  Contributed by Thomas Friol.

author: pauls
msg: Per spec a call to PackageAdmin.getBundle(Class) should return the Bundle that has the classloader that loaded this class. We only return the bundle if it is a real one (i.e., not the system bundle). This returns the system bundle in case the class comes from the classloader (or one of its parents) that loaded Felix and the system bundle exports the package.
